body: Perhaps the best 1st-level spell in the game, magic missile may not do a lot of damage, but it requires no attack roll, has a medium range, needs no saving throw, and harms incorporeal creatures. Even if magic missile were 2nd-level, smart casters would still learn it.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Designing Spells/Benchmarks/1st Level/Magic Missile
name: Magic Missile
